title: Renovated 1st Floor Unit w/ Vinyl Flooring
posting_body: ['Carlyle', '4500 Carlyle Street, Santa Clara, CA, 95054', 'Interested in more information?', 'See link below:', '<URL>', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 104', 'OR Text', '104', 'to', 'show contact info', 'for more information.', 'The Carlyle Apartments in Santa Clara, CA', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1208 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'An elegant resort and prestigious community, rich with amenities designed to enhance your pleasure.', 'Features like crystal waterfalls, a sparkling pool, soothing spas, a state-of-the-art fitness center, residences of unparalleled quality, and services of unequaled sophistication, including advanced high speed Internet access.', 'This is not a mere vacation paradise; this is your HOME.', 'Here, you can relax and enjoy a community designed to bring a new dimension of satisfaction and sophistication to your life.', 'Every imaginable detail has been addressed, ensuring all your needs are met with gracious efficiency.', 'A discerning rental community that takes residential living to new heights.', 'Features', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Private Garages*', '- High Speed Internet Available at Clubhouse', 'Community Amenities', '- Business Center', '- Resort-Style Pool & Spa', '- Parcel Pending', '- Garden Areas', '- Car Wash Area', '- Controlled Access Entry Building', '- EV Charging Stations', '- Clubhouse', '- Fitness Center', '- Dry Cleaning Valet Services', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Sunday: 8:30AM-5:30PM', 'Pet Policy', 'Pet Friendly, contact office for details', 'Income Requirements:', "2.5 x's monthly rent", 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'AMC-CA, Inc. dba Apartment Management Consultants-BRE #01525033', 'EYiRAr1C']
